TopicTitle: KSP crashes after loading a savefile with Principia installed

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.12.5 Windows 64bit
Problem: Principia crashes the game, during the save file loading process. (KSP works and loads fine without it)

Mods Installed:

Modlist from CKAN (Principia isnt mentioned in it, altough Principia 岩澤 for 1.12.5 is installed)

Reproduction Steps:

Select a save file or create a new one, then load it up.

Log:

Player.log

More info on request.
